entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Ronge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -26.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
